snippet: A Westport, Conn., woman is facing a charge of breach of peace for taking a pellet gun to a debate about gun control.
abstract: Peace activist Estelle Margolis of Westport, Conn, is facing charge of breach of peace for taking pellet gun to debate about gun control, hoping to demonstrate how easy it is to purchase a gun and ammunition; Westport police officials say she made poor decision that could have escalated into tragedy when she was seen carrying a gun under a cloth on her way to meeting.
lead_paragraph: A Westport, Conn., woman is facing a charge of breach of peace for taking a pellet gun to a debate about gun control.

headline.seo: Peace Activist Fights Charge for Pellet Gun at Connecticut Debate
headline.main: So, a Peace Activist Takes a BB Gun to a Meeting ...
headline.print_headline: So, a Peace Activist Takes a BB Gun to a Meeting ...
